title: 101+ Best AI Tools for Business & Marketing 2024
description: Looking for the best AI tools & resources? We're actively compiling the ultimate list of the best artificial intelligence tools & resources.
author: Jacob Cass
excerpt: Looking for the best AI tools & resources? We're actively compiling the ultimate list of the best artificial intelligence tools & resources for business.
text: Looking for the best AI tools & resources? We’re actively compiling the ultimate list of the best artificial intelligence tools for business right here. Artificial Intelligence (AI) is revolutionizing the way we live and work, and its applications are varied and far-reaching. From healthcare to finance, transportation to design, AI is being used to improve efficiency, accuracy, and decision-making. However, with so many different AI tools and technologies available, it can be difficult to know which ones are the best suited for a particular task. In this blog post, we’ll take a look at some of the best AI tools available today and sort them by category for your convenience. Whether you’re a designer, a developer, or a business leader, you’ll learn about the different options available for implementing AI in your business. We’ve sifted through the junk and selected the crème de la crème for you. ChatGPT — Best AI ChatBot & Best AI Tool Overall (Try these advanced Prompts) Jasper — Best AI Copywriting Tool Luminar — Best AI Photo Editing Software MidJourney — Best AI Art Generator (or Try Adobe Express AI Free) Synthesia — Best AI Video Tool Looka Logo Maker — Best AI Logo Maker & Branding (Still a long way to go) Business Name Generator — Best AI Naming Tool Wix ADI — Best AI Website Builder Shutterstock Generator — Generate licensable AI stock art – Get 10 Free! Originality AI — Best Plagiarism Checker & AI Detector “AI will not replace you. A person using AI will.” This quote is just so powerful. Use this as motivation to integrate AI into your workflow for better efficiency & perhaps, better results. Let’s dive into our complete list of the best artificial intelligence tools for business, the best AI tools for students, and the best free AI tools. AI Writing Tools Get AI to write content, tweets, blogs, and more for you with these AI copywriting tools. Jasper AI — AI content generator, includes 10,000 free bonus credits (Top Pick) Moonbeam — Long-form AI writing assistant, includes free 15,000 words Copy AI — AI content generator Craftly — An AI copywriting studio Longshot AI — AI writing asssitant Conto AI — Create engaging articles and marketing copy WordTune — AI that will improve your writing Passed.AI — Plagiarism checker & AI detector Originality AI — Plagiarism checker & AI detector (Top Pick) WriteHuman — Bypass AI detection this AI Humanizer Notebook LM — Notetaking and Research Assistant See the best copywriting courses here. AI Chat & Search ChatGPT — AI conversational tool trained on vast text data; free, $20/mo for faster response with ChatGPT-4 (Top Pick) Google Bard — A conversational AI tool by Google CoPilot (Formerly called Bing Chat) – Microsoft’s conversational AI tool Perplexity — Free Q&A tool with direct responses and citations. YouChat — Free conversational tool with ChatGPT-style conversations; sign-in required. NeevaAI — Free AI-generated responses with citations, followed by standard search results; sign-in required. Poe — Free Quora conversational AI with multiple assistants. See our prompt framework guide. AI Logo Design Makers & Branding Tools Get AI to create your logo design & branding. Looka Logo Maker— AI logo maker + branding tool (Top Pick) LogoAI — AI logo maker MakeLogo — AI logo maker Brand Bot — AI assistant that’s an expert on Branding, Marketing & Design See more free logo makers here and our list of the best AI tools for designers. Brand Bot™ – Custom GPT for Branding, Marketing, Strategy & Design Brand Bot™ is our very own chatGPT built for branding professionals. Our BrandBot™ AI assistant that’s an expert on Branding, Marketing & Design. Try it here. AI Website Builders Get AI to create your website. Wix ADI – AI-Powered Website Builder (Top Pick) Durable — AI Website Builder See more website builders here. Best AI Business Tools Validator — Get AI to give you feedback on your business idea Fireflies — AI notetaker to help your team record, transcribe, search, and analyze voice conversations. (Top Pick) See more business tools here. AI Naming Tools Get AI to help name your brand name & domain. Business Name Generator — Brainstorm ideas, check availability, and see logo ideas instantly. (Top Pick) Naming Magic — Use AI to name your company and find a domain, with a focus on AI domains. See more naming resources here. AI Photography Tools Get AI to power up your photography. Luminar — Best professional AI photo editing software (Top Pick) Mokker — Get professional photos of your product with AI Ai Stock Imagery — Generate graphics & stock imagery with AI Lensa AI — AI photo editing iOS & Android app Shutterstock Generator — Generate licensable AI stock imagery – Get 10 AI Images Free! (Top Pick) See more AI photo editing software here. AI Marketing Tools Generate marketing collateral with AI. CreativeFlow by Shutterstock — A suite of apps for design & marketing (Top Pick) Ai Stock Imagery – Generate graphics & stock imagery with AI Mokker — Get professional photos of your product with AI. Ortto — Your customer data, messaging & analytics together. Luna — Personalize cold emails to close more deals Reply — Get more meetings with this sales engagement platfor See more marketing tools here. AI Video Tools Create professional videos with AI, without actors, equipment, or a studio. Synthesia – AI video creation that creates videos from plain text (Top Pick) Murf AI — AI Text to Speech Replica Studios — AI Text to Voice Generator Listnr Tech — AI Voiceover Tool Microsoft VALL-E — Mimic anyone’s voice with just 3-seconds of audio (not yet public) VideoProc Converter AI — Best budget-friendly AI video enhancer See more video editing software here. Adobe FireFly — See our Adobe Firefly Review (Top Pick) Shutterstock Generator — Generate licensable AI stock art – Get 10 AI Art Images Free! MidJourney — AI based art generator (Top Pick) Leonardo — A powerful AI art generator Krea.ai  — An AI creative suite Canva AI — Canva’s Image Generator Dall E 2 — Create realistic images and art from a description in natural language. Bing Create — Create images from words with AI DiffusionBee — Generate AI art on your computer with StableDiffusion Photoshonic —Paints your dreams with pixels AiPicasso — Create art with Powerful AI Diffusion Bee — Free downloadable app to create AI art using Stable Diffusion See more AI art generators here. AI Development Tools Get AI assistance writing code and developing software. ChatGPT — Versatile AI chat bot Bito — AI Coding bot (Top Pick) AI Code Reviewer — Get your code reviewed See the best coding courses here. Looking for a list of free AI Tools? We’ve sifted through the junk and selected the top 10 for you. Brand Bot — AI assistant that’s an expert on Branding, Marketing & Design MoodBoard Maker — A game changing AI for designers! 🎨✨ ReCraft — AI Image Generator for Designers See more AI tools for designers. AI Mastery for Creative Professionals: The Advanced Guide & Prompt Pack Introducing our very own “AI Mastery for Creative Professionals: The Advanced Guide & Prompt Pack“, the ultimate resource for creative professionals looking to harness the power of AI and ChatGPT. html:
Looking for the best AI tools & resources? We’re actively compiling the ultimate list of the best artificial intelligence tools for business right here.

Artificial Intelligence (AI) is revolutionizing the way we live and work, and its applications are varied and far-reaching. From healthcare to finance, transportation to design, AI is being used to improve efficiency, accuracy, and decision-making.

However, with so many different AI tools and technologies available, it can be difficult to know which ones are the best suited for a particular task. In this blog post, we’ll take a look at some of the best AI tools available today and sort them by category for your convenience.

Whether you’re a designer, a developer, or a business leader, you’ll learn about the different options available for implementing AI in your business.

We’ve sifted through the junk and selected the crème de la crème for you.

  1. ChatGPT — Best AI ChatBot & Best AI Tool Overall (Try these advanced Prompts)
  2. Jasper — Best AI Copywriting Tool
  3. Luminar — Best AI Photo Editing Software
  4. MidJourney — Best AI Art Generator (or Try Adobe Express AI Free)
  5. Synthesia — Best AI Video Tool
  6. Looka Logo Maker — Best AI Logo Maker & Branding (Still a long way to go)
  7. Business Name Generator — Best AI Naming Tool
  8. Wix ADI — Best AI Website Builder
  9. Shutterstock Generator — Generate licensable AI stock art – Get 10 Free!
  10. Originality AI — Best Plagiarism Checker & AI Detector

“AI will not replace you. A person using AI will.”

This quote is just so powerful. Use this as motivation to integrate AI into your workflow for better efficiency & perhaps, better results.

Let’s dive into our complete list of the best artificial intelligence tools for business, the best AI tools for students, and the best free AI tools.

AI Writing Tools

Get AI to write content, tweets, blogs, and more for you with these AI copywriting tools.

  • Jasper AI — AI content generator, includes 10,000 free bonus credits (Top Pick)
  • Moonbeam — Long-form AI writing assistant, includes free 15,000 words
  • Copy AI — AI content generator
  • Craftly — An AI copywriting studio
  • Longshot AI — AI writing asssitant
  • Conto AI — Create engaging articles and marketing copy
  • WordTune — AI that will improve your writing
  • Passed.AI — Plagiarism checker & AI detector
  • Originality AI — Plagiarism checker & AI detector (Top Pick)
  • WriteHuman — Bypass AI detection this AI Humanizer
  • Notebook LM — Notetaking and Research Assistant

See the best copywriting courses here.

AI Chat & Search

  • ChatGPT — AI conversational tool trained on vast text data; free, $20/mo for faster response with ChatGPT-4 (Top Pick)
  • Google Bard — A conversational AI tool by Google
  • CoPilot (Formerly called Bing Chat) – Microsoft’s conversational AI tool
  • Perplexity — Free Q&A tool with direct responses and citations.
  • YouChat — Free conversational tool with ChatGPT-style conversations; sign-in required.
  • NeevaAI — Free AI-generated responses with citations, followed by standard search results; sign-in required.
  • Poe — Free Quora conversational AI with multiple assistants.

See our prompt framework guide.

AI Logo Design Makers & Branding Tools

Get AI to create your logo design & branding.

  • Looka Logo Maker— AI logo maker + branding tool (Top Pick)
  • LogoAI — AI logo maker
  • MakeLogo — AI logo maker
  • Brand Bot — AI assistant that’s an expert on Branding, Marketing & Design

See more free logo makers here and our list of the best AI tools for designers.

Brand Bot™ is our very own chatGPT built for branding professionals. Our BrandBot™ AI assistant that’s an expert on Branding, Marketing & Design. Try it here.

AI Website Builders

Get AI to create your website.

  • Wix ADI – AI-Powered Website Builder (Top Pick)
  • Durable — AI Website Builder

See more website builders here.

Best AI Business Tools

  • Validator — Get AI to give you feedback on your business idea
  • Fireflies — AI notetaker to help your team record, transcribe, search, and analyze voice conversations. (Top Pick)

See more business tools here.

AI Naming Tools

Get AI to help name your brand name & domain.

  • Business Name Generator — Brainstorm ideas, check availability, and see logo ideas instantly. (Top Pick)
  • Naming Magic — Use AI to name your company and find a domain, with a focus on AI domains.

See more naming resources here.

AI Photography Tools

Get AI to power up your photography.

  • Luminar — Best professional AI photo editing software (Top Pick)
  • Mokker — Get professional photos of your product with AI
  • Ai Stock Imagery — Generate graphics & stock imagery with AI
  • Lensa AI — AI photo editing iOS & Android app
  • Shutterstock Generator — Generate licensable AI stock imagery – Get 10 AI Images Free! (Top Pick)

See more AI photo editing software here.

AI Marketing Tools

Generate marketing collateral with AI.

  • CreativeFlow by Shutterstock — A suite of apps for design & marketing (Top Pick)
  • Ai Stock Imagery – Generate graphics & stock imagery with AI
  • Mokker — Get professional photos of your product with AI.
  • Ortto — Your customer data, messaging & analytics together.
  • Luna — Personalize cold emails to close more deals
  • Reply — Get more meetings with this sales engagement platfor

See more marketing tools here.

AI Video Tools

Create professional videos with AI, without actors, equipment, or a studio.

  • Synthesia – AI video creation that creates videos from plain text (Top Pick)
  • Murf AI — AI Text to Speech
  • Replica Studios — AI Text to Voice Generator
  • Listnr Tech — AI Voiceover Tool
  • Microsoft VALL-E — Mimic anyone’s voice with just 3-seconds of audio (not yet public)
  • VideoProc Converter AI — Best budget-friendly AI video enhancer

See more video editing software here.

AI Art Generators

Get beautiful art created by AI with these tools.

  • Adobe FireFly — See our Adobe Firefly Review (Top Pick)
  • Shutterstock Generator — Generate licensable AI stock art – Get 10 AI Art Images Free!
  • MidJourney — AI based art generator (Top Pick)
  • Leonardo — A powerful AI art generator
  • Krea.ai  — An AI creative suite
  • Canva AI — Canva’s Image Generator
  • Dall E 2 — Create realistic images and art from a description in natural language.
  • Bing Create — Create images from words with AI
  • DiffusionBee — Generate AI art on your computer with StableDiffusion
  • Photoshonic —Paints your dreams with pixels
  • AiPicasso — Create art with Powerful AI
  • Diffusion Bee — Free downloadable app to create AI art using Stable Diffusion

See more AI art generators here.

AI Development Tools

Get AI assistance writing code and developing software.

  • ChatGPT — Versatile AI chat bot
  • Bito — AI Coding bot (Top Pick)
  • AI Code Reviewer — Get your code reviewed

See the best coding courses here.

Looking for a list of free AI Tools? We’ve sifted through the junk and selected the top 10 for you.

  1. ChatGPT — Best AI ChatBot & Best AI Tool Overall
  2. MidJourney — Best AI Art Generator (Free 25 credits)
  3. Moonbeam — Best AI Copywriting Tool (Free 15,000 words)
  4. Looka Logo Maker — Best AI Logo Maker & Branding Platform
  5. Business Name Generator — Best AI Naming Tool
  6. Wix ADI — Best AI Website Builder
  7. Ai Stock Imagery — Best AI Stock Photography Tool (10 Free Credits)
  8. Bito — Best AI Coding Tool
  9. Validator — Get AI to give you feedback on your business idea
  10. Dall E 2 — Create realistic images and art from a description (50 Free Credits)

  10. Brand Bot — AI assistant that’s an expert on Branding, Marketing & Design

Don’t miss out on this opportunity to unlock the full potential of AI for your creative services. Our Advanced ChatGPT Guide & Prompt Pack is the ultimate resource for creative professionals, and it is a must-have for anyone looking to stay ahead in the game.
